content.raw:
We are using catkin_make.   We have custom packages we are creating, which do not have the install commands in the cmakes.  So either the catkin_make works with our packages, or the catkin_make install works with the subt packages. 

Will everything need to be done through catkin_make install in order to work on aws?  Would really like to not have to setup all our cmakes again if possible.
content.html:
We are using catkin_make. We have custom packages we are creating, which do not have the install commands in the cmakes. So either the catkin_make works with our packages, or the catkin_make install works with the subt packages.

Will everything need to be done through catkin_make install in order to work on aws? Would really like to not have to setup all our cmakes again if possible.
